message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.DS, cs.ST. 

The paper proposes a novel active learning algorithm using a convex surrogate loss to broaden the cases for which active learning achieves an exponential improvement. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the Machine Learning (cs.LG) sub-category. Additionally, the paper deals with the reduction of label complexity, which is a common problem in active learning, and thus it could also belong to the Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) sub-category. The paper also mentions the use of a convex loss in reducing computational cost, which is a common technique in Computer Vision (cs.CV). The paper also deals with empirical estimation and expectation, which are common concepts in Data Structures (cs.DS) and Statistics (cs.ST). Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.DS, and cs.ST.
